title: WCD Chittoor Recruitment 2025 - Apply offline for Multi Purpose Staff Posts
description: The Women and Child Development Chittoor (WCD Chittoor) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Multi-Purpose Staff Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass can apply for the WCD Chittor Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process,...
